Title: Object: The Wayfarers
Description: Holy Family among rocks; Mary holding Jesus and sitting on the ground; Joseph with left foot raised standing at left; stone cancelled with intersecting horizontal and diagonal lines. 1904 Lithograph
Producer name: Print made by: Charles Hazelwood Shannon
Curator's comments: See 1905,0722.1 for impression in dark green/black ink taken from stone before its cancellation.
Bibliographic references: Derry 1920 / The Lithographs of Charles Shannon: with a catalogue of lithographs issued between the years 1904 and 1918 (57)
Acquisition name: Donated by: Charles Hazelwood Shannon (executors of)
